trans-unit.source: Deploy the ARM template by using PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Deploy the ARM template by using PowerShell

trans-unit.source: To deploy the ARM template you downloaded by using PowerShell, follow the steps below.
trans-unit.target: To deploy the ARM template you downloaded by using PowerShell, follow the steps below.

trans-unit.source: If you have never used Azure PowerShell, see [How to Install and Configure Azure PowerShell](powershell-install-configure.md) and follow the instructions all the way to the end to sign into Azure and select your subscription.
trans-unit.target: If you have never used Azure PowerShell, see [How to Install and Configure Azure PowerShell](powershell-install-configure.md) and follow the instructions all the way to the end to sign into Azure and select your subscription.

trans-unit.source: Run the **Switch-AzureMode** cmdlet to switch to Resource Manager mode, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: Run the **Switch-AzureMode** cmdlet to switch to Resource Manager mode, as shown below.

trans-unit.source: WARNING: The Switch-AzureMode cmdlet is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.
trans-unit.target: WARNING: The Switch-AzureMode cmdlet is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.WARNING] The Switch-AzureMode cmdlet will be deprecated soon.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.WARNING] The Switch-AzureMode cmdlet will be deprecated soon.

trans-unit.source: When that happens, all Resource Manager cmdlets will be renamed.
trans-unit.target: When that happens, all Resource Manager cmdlets will be renamed.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, run the **New-AzureResourceGroup** cmdlet to create a new resource group.
trans-unit.target: If necessary, run the **New-AzureResourceGroup** cmdlet to create a new resource group.

trans-unit.source: The command below creates a resource group named *TestRG* in the *Central US* azure region.
trans-unit.target: The command below creates a resource group named *TestRG* in the *Central US* azure region.

trans-unit.source: For more information about resource groups, visit [Azure Resource Manager Overview](resource-group-overview.md/#resource-groups).
trans-unit.target: For more information about resource groups, visit [Azure Resource Manager Overview](resource-group-overview.md/#resource-groups).

trans-unit.source: Run the **New-AzureResourceGroupDeployment** cmdlet to deploy the new VNet by using the template and parameter files you downloaded and modified above.
trans-unit.target: Run the **New-AzureResourceGroupDeployment** cmdlet to deploy the new VNet by using the template and parameter files you downloaded and modified above.

trans-unit.source: Run the **Get-AzureVirtualNetwork** cmdlet to view the properties of the new VNet, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: Run the **Get-AzureVirtualNetwork** cmdlet to view the properties of the new VNet, as shown below.
